data.name: Sheikh Abdullah Oduro
data.description: Sh. Abdullah Oduro is Islamic University at Madinah, Saudi Arabia, graduate. He has established KnewU â€“ a non-profit organization for new Muslims which educates the new and non-Muslims intensively in Islamic studies. He also has experience in the medical field as an adjunct instructor for surgical technology & procedures. His area of interest and competencies are Problem-Solving, Mentorship, and Research. Other area of his expertise is as English language instructor and coach.

data.name: Sheikh Waleed Basyouni
data.description: Sheikh Waleed Basyouni is Vice President of AlMaghrib Institute and Director of Clear Lake Islamic Center (CLIC). He is a frequent guest speaker at Universities, Conventions, Radio Talk Shows, Television, Interfaith meetings, and community centers nationally and internationally. He is also a member of the North American Imam Federation (NAIF), Assembly of Muslim Jurists in America (AMJA)-Fatwa and Research Committee, Director of Texas Dawah Convention, and Advisor to numerous Islamic Societies/Organizations around the US. Shaykh Waleed Basyouni graduated with a Bachelors in Islamic Sciences from Al-Imam Muhammad University, KSA; did his Masters in Islamic Theology, World Religions and Modern Religious Sects from Al-Imam Muhammad University; and acquired a Doctorate in Theology. He is also an instructor at the American Open University in Alexandria, VA, USA, and serves as, the Imam of Clear Lake Islamic Center, Houston, TX, USA. Shaykh Waleed has Ijaazahs in reciting the Holy Quran and in several books of Hadeeth, awarded by various scholars. He studied with great scholars time such as Shaykh Ibn Baz, Abdul-Razzaq Afify and others.

data.name: Imam Fahmi Zubir
data.description: He is a full imam of at IMAAM Center, Washington, DC. He is originally from Indonesia. He graduated from Al-Azhar University, Cairo with Bachelor Degree in Theology in 2000, and from Syiah Kuala University, Indonesia with Master Degree in Education Management. Ustadz Fahmi has many experiences in dakwah and religious training in Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, United Emirate Arab, and Japan. He is also very active in many social activities such as become a trainer in disaster reduction risks, traumatic healings for tsunami orphans, humanitarian care consultation, motivation activation for teachers, and many others. He is also active in many social and religious organizations such as Majlis Intelectual Ulama Muda Indonesia (MIUMI), Aceh Bina Ummat Foundation, Aceh Peduli Pendidikan (APP), Mitra Manajemen Zakat Consulting (MMZC), and Masyarakat Peduli Pendidikan Foundation.

data.name: Ustadzah Rita S Pritarini
data.description: Ustadzah Rita Pritarini, mother of three, after graduated from Gontor Boarding School earned her double degree from Indonesia University for Arabic Language major and Tafseer Hadits from Islamic Institute Jakarta. She is currently an Islamic Studies teacher at Salam Islamic School Missouri. One of her daughters memorized Quran at the age of 12.

data.name: Ustadz Salim A Fillah
data.description: Salim A. Fillah adalah penulis buku-buku islami produktif asal Yogyakarta. Sejak kecil dia sudah menggemari buku. Dunia tulis-menulis mulai ditekuninya ketika menempuh pendidikan di SMA Teladan Yogyakarta.[2] Aktivitas kepenulisannya mulai dikenal secara luas ketika menerbitkan buku Nikmatnya Pacaran Setelah Pernikahan (2003). Buku tersebut sekaligus merupakan buku pertama yang diterbikan oleh Pro-U Media. Selain menulis buku, Salim A. Fillah juga aktif dalam kepengurusan Masjid Jogokariyan Yogyakarta. Di masjid ini, Salim A. Fillah berlaku sebagai pengasuh pengajian Majelis Jejak Nabi. Karya: Nikmatnya Pacaran Setelah Pernikahan (2003) Agar Bidadari Cemburu Padamu (2004) Barakallahu Laka: Bahagianya Merayakan Cinta (2005) Gue Never Die (2006) Saksikan Bahwa Aku Seorang Muslim (2007) Jalan Cinta Para Pejuang (2008) Dalam Dekapan Ukhuwah (2010) Lapis-lapis Keberkahan (2014).
